name: Rebounding Resilience
description:
(Recommended that you play in fullscreen)

Rebounding Resilience is an upbeat platforming game that takes anywhere between 5-15 minutes to beat. The game is about a bunny's (the player's) quest to get a golden carrot. Throughout the quest, the player is presented with numerous challenges that they must be resilient to overcome. These challenges include tough platforming, different kinds of enemies, and persevering through failure. 

How To Play
  • Use Your Mouse To Control The Jump Trajectory 
  • Left Click To Jump
  • Escape Key To Pause Game
Games For Change

This game was created for the 2021 G4C Student Challenge Competition.  It was entered under the 'Resilience Through Games' theme.

Assets Used
  • Font - https://www.dafont.com/bd-cartoon-shout.font
  • Game Music - "Super Duper!" Upbeat Adventure Game Music by HeatleyBros
  • Art  - Jumper Pack By Kenney & Background Elements by Kenney
